General.Name: Fonciere Inea
General.Description: Fonciere Inea S.A., a real estate investment company, engages in owning and managing business real estate properties in France. As of December 31, 2010, its property portfolio consisted of 111 buildings. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Paris, France.
General.Address: 7 rue du FossE Blanc, Gennevilliers, France, 92230
